description: Fired when an entity's mouth engagement lock is released, allowing the mouth to be used for other activities. This event signals that the entity is no longer engaged in mouth-specific actions like kissing.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'core:mouth_engagement_unlocked' event payload.

actorId.description: The unique instance ID of the entity whose mouth engagement was unlocked.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the mouth engagement was unlocked.
